description: This Python source file defines a plugin class 'bootimg-biosplusefi' for 'wic', responsible for creating a combined BIOS and EFI boot partition. It includes class methods to instantiate sub-modules for BIOS and EFI boot images, and methods to install, configure and prepare disk partitions by delegating to those sub-modules.

classes.name: BootimgBiosPlusEFIPlugin
classes.description: A plugin class for creating bootable disk images containing both BIOS and EFI boot partitions using 'wic'.

methods.name: __init__(cls)
methods.description: Constructor intended to instantiate subclasses for BIOS and EFI modules, note that it may not be called automatically due to pluginbase behavior.

methods.name: __instanciateSubClasses(cls)
methods.description: Loads and initializes the 'bootimg-pcbios' and 'bootimg-efi' modules dynamically, creating respective plugin instances.

methods.name: do_install_disk(cls, disk, disk_name, creator, workdir, oe_builddir, bootimg_dir, kernel_dir, native_sysroot)
methods.description: Invokes the disk installation process on both BIOS and EFI modules to finalize disk image creation.

methods.name: do_configure_partition(cls, part, source_params, creator, cr_workdir, oe_builddir, bootimg_dir, kernel_dir, native_sysroot)
methods.description: Configures partition parameters for both BIOS and EFI modules prior to partition setup.

methods.name: do_prepare_partition(cls, part, source_params, creator, cr_workdir, oe_builddir, bootimg_dir, kernel_dir, rootfs_dir, native_sysroot)
methods.description: Prepares partition content for both BIOS and EFI to be included in the final disk image.

ctags.name: do_configure_partition
ctags.pattern: /^    def do_configure_partition(cls, part, source_params, creator, cr_workdir,$/
ctags.signature: (cls, part, source_params, creator, cr_workdir, oe_builddir, bootimg_dir, kernel_dir, native_sysroot)

ctags.name: do_install_disk
ctags.pattern: /^    def do_install_disk(cls, disk, disk_name, creator, workdir, oe_builddir,$/
ctags.signature: (cls, disk, disk_name, creator, workdir, oe_builddir, bootimg_dir, kernel_dir, native_sysroot)

ctags.name: do_prepare_partition
ctags.pattern: /^    def do_prepare_partition(cls, part, source_params, creator, cr_workdir,$/
ctags.signature: (cls, part, source_params, creator, cr_workdir, oe_builddir, bootimg_dir, kernel_dir, rootfs_dir, native_sysroot)
